plot: Shows the backstory of three characters: Ryousuke Kominato after he returns home and his relationship with his brother, Kuramochi as a delinquent in middle school, and Norifumi Kawakami's struggle in his first year at Seidou.
opening_theme: "Hashire! Mirai" (疾走れ！ミライ; Run Ahead Toward the Future!) by GLAY
ending_theme: "PROMISED FIELD" by Ryota Ohsaka, Nobunaga Shimazaki, & Natsuki Hanae (eps 1-2)
"FINAL VICTORY" by Seidō High School Baseball Team (ep 3)
